Plot: The bestselling author of The Forbidden Game brings readers the second volume in her all-new horror trilogy, Dark Visions. Now, Kaitlyn Fairchild and her four friends have no choice but to follow their own psychic gifts . . . to a lonely white house on a cliff . . . and into the terrifying unknown!
Characters: Rob Kessler, Kaitlyn Fairchild, Lewis Chao, Gabriel Wolfe, Anna Whiteraven
